title: Poland: Plant Your Tree with Citi Handlowy - Now Also on Facebook
summary: Warsaw - For five years, as part of the "Wiecej drzew dzieki Tobie" ("More Trees, Thanks to You") program, Citi Handlowy has encouraged its customers to give up paper statements and agree to receiving statements in electronic form. Thanks to this, 520,000 trees have already been planted! An application on the CitiMobile profile was launched this month promoting such pro-environmental initiatives.
tag-1: Poland: Plant Your Tree with Citi Handlowy - Now Also on Facebook
tag-2: Warsaw – For five years, as part of the "Wiecej drzew dzieki Tobie" ("More Trees, Thanks to You") program, Citi Handlowy has encouraged its customers to give up paper statements and agree to receiving statements in electronic form. Thanks to this, 520,000 trees have already been planted! An application on the CitiMobile profile was launched this month promoting such pro-environmental initiatives.
tag-3: "The achievements of this campaign are already significant, but we will not rest on our laurels. This month, we have prepared a special application on the CitiMobile profile on Facebook. It is available to customers who do not receive electronic statements. For each grown virtual tree, the bank will plant a real one. What is more, customers can win prizes," said Damian Zozula, Head of Online Marketing and Remote Sales Unit, Citi Handlowy.
tag-4: The application "Posadz swoje drzewo" ("Plant Your Tree") has been available from the CitiMobile fan page on Facebook since July10. Those customers who decide to change their account or credit card statements from paper to electronic ones receive a unique code allowing them to plant their virtual tree in the application on Facebook. The user can choose the type of the tree (for example, a pine or oak tree) and name it. Points received for particular actions make it possible for the planted tree to grow. As part of this initiative, the participants can win eco bags and eco bracelets from YES. More information is available from the CitiMobile profile on Facebook.
tag-5: "More Trees Thanks to You" is a partnership program of Citi Handlowy, the Leopold Kronenberg Foundation operating at the bank and the League of Nature Conservation (Liga Ochrony Przyrody). As part of the initiative, areas in selected forest districts in Poland are afforested every year. The afforestation process is implemented under supervision and in accordance with the plan of afforestation and recreation of "green corridors" adopted by Lasy Panstwowe (State Forests).
tag-6: For more information about the campaign, please visit: https://www.online.citibank.pl/las/
tag-7: The video coverage from the first edition of 2008 is available from: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RwgRSfB5zVE&feature=relmfu

tag-10: Citi Handlowy Citi Handlowy is one of the major financial institutions in Poland and offers, under the Citi Handlowy brand, a broad range of state-of-the-art products in corporate, investment and consumer banking. Through its modern distribution channels and a network of over 138 branches, Bank Handlowy services 20,000 corporate customers and 965,000 individual ones. The Bank's group includes Dom Maklerski Banku Handlowego (brokerage house) and Handlowy Leasing. Being a member of Citi enables the customers of Bank Handlowy access to financial services provided in over 100 countries. Further information is available at www.citihandlowy.pl.
